scripts.elm-nuke: rm -rf elm-stuff && elm package install -y && cd tests && rm -rf elm-stuff && elm package install -y && cd ..
scripts.gen:starwars: npm run build && cd example/starwars && ../../bin/graphqelm https://graphqelm.herokuapp.com/api && elm-format src/Api --yes && cd -
scripts.gen:github: npm run build && cd example/github && ../../bin/graphqelm https://api.github.com/graphql --header 'authorization: Bearer dbd4c239b0bbaa40ab0ea291fa811775da8f5b59' && elm-format src/Api --yes && cd -
scripts.gen:menu: npm run build && cd example/ && ../bin/graphqelm http://localhost:4000/api && elm-format src/Api --yes && cd -
